Text.Page:
One day, we saw an immense, dark bird gliding over the valley. It started dropping somethingâ€”eggs, maybe?

The "eggs" contained some kind of proto-argons that joined together in different combinations. Argons that self-assemble. Troubling.

We've run out of food, and the argons have poisoned everything here, so we can't forage.

Tomorrow I'll search the hills above the Agnurok Engine for more answers.Put message away.
